description:
Season Six Match
VENDETTA
Vendetta
HT: 5'6
WT: 135 lbs
Season record (1-0)
Lifetime record (15-3)
Not Ranked
VAI
The Apprentice
HT: 5'2
WT: 112lbs
Season record (0-1)
Lifetime record (0-1)
Not Ranked
Vendetta, the season 4 Champion, is back with a vengeance and takes on newcomer Vai. Ranked number 2 this season, Vendetta uses her size, strength and experience to teach the Apprentice what US is all about. Vai, only 5'2 and 112lbs, in her very first match here at US proves that she is feisty and determined. But this Apprentice has a lot more to learn on the mat. Get some fingers in this newbie and she does not stand a chance.
Leg locks, chin holds, face sitting, submission attempts, and lots of finger fucking and pussy licking, this update has it all. The Apprentice left this match with a sore ass and some lessons for next time, thanks to Vendetta's round 4 schooling.
title: Vendetta (1-0) vs Vai "The Apprentice" (0-0)
